issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Doesnt work with Ti Mobile SDK 1.6.1 on iPhone Do work in 1.6.0 !!! 1) Create new project with name: Küche 2) Launch emulator 3) Build process aborted with this Error: {code} [ERROR] Error: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/1.6.1/iphone/builder.py", line 1091, in main execute_xcode("iphonesimulator%s" % link_version,["GCC_PREPROCESSOR_DEFINITIONS=LOGID__=%s DEPLOYTYPE=development TI_DEVELOPMENT=1 DEBUG=1 TI_VERSION=%s" % (log_id,sdk_version)],False) File "/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/1.6.1/iphone/builder.py", line 1012, in execute_xcode output = run.run(args,False,False,o) File "/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/1.6.1/iphone/run.py", line 39, in run sys.exit(rc) SystemExit: 1 {code}

comments.body: This is no longer an issue as of Titanium SDK 6 and probably fixed in Titanium SDK 3 or 4 era.
Closing ticket as "Cannot Reproduce" with reference to the above comments.
